alice.tuprologx.ide

Class JavaIOManager.PrologFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      • alice.tuprologx.ide.JavaIOManager.PrologFileFilter
  • Enclosing class:
    JavaIOManager

    private class JavaIOManager.PrologFileFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
    A convenience implementation of FileFilter that filters out all files except the ones supposed to be Prolog files, recognized by the ".pro" or ".pl" extensions.
    Version:
    1.0 - Monday 16th December, 2002
    Author:
    Giulio Piancastelli

        public boolean accept(java.io.File f)
        Return true if this file should be shown in the directory pane, false if it shouldn't. Files that begin with "." are ignored.
